author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Sunnyvale, CA is gearing up for a parade for their centennial celebration. They are interested in costing information that you might be able to provide re: the parade(s) s you’ve coordinated in you agency.  Obviously there are many contingencies, such as police overtime rates, size of parade etc., but, whatever data you might have that says for example, “our city sponsored a one mile parade and it cost approximately $__”, that would be hugely helpful.  Or even the total number of staff hours devoted to planning and running the parade would be useful.
Thank you
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Centennial Parade Planning
